review:
I recently had dental crowns done to improve my smile, and the results are outstanding. Dr Manish‚Äôs ********* *** expertise were evident throughout the entire process. From the initial consultation to the final fitting, every step was handled with meticulous care. 

The smile makeover exceeded my expectations, thanks to the Dr Manish‚Äôs exceptional skill and meticulous attention to detail, resulting in a beautifully natural and confident smile.

Dr Manish explained each procedure clearly, ensuring I was comfortable and informed. Their attention to detail and precision in crafting the crowns have given me a natural-looking and beautiful smile. 
The staff was incredibly supportive and made the experience pleasant and stress-free. I was particularly impressed by the modern technology used, which ensured a perfect fit and seamless integration with my existing teeth. The entire team demonstrated a high level of professionalism and dedication to patient satisfaction. I am thrilled with the outcome and grateful for the exceptional service.

 I highly recommend Dr Manish‚Äôs dental practice for anyone seeking expert dental care and a stunning smile transformation.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Manish is extremely credible and proficient in his practice. I experienced a great service (teeth cleaning and filling). I did not feel any discomfort or sensitivity or any sort of pain. His expertise combined with world class instruments made all the difference. The results were excellent!! My 5 year old son also was very happy with his cavity filling. Thank you Dr. Manish for your efforts and great work! We wish you all the very best!

review:
Everyone here is so friendly and welcoming, it really makes you feel comfortable.
The doctor is really nice and asks about my day, school, hobbies etc and shows a genuine interest in my life.
The procedures are generally painless and the appointments always start on schedule.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My husband and I visited doctor for root canal treatment and bridge. The doctor explained us various options. The entire procedure was pain free. He made us comfortable. Doctor never hurried up during any visit on the contrary explained us what he was doing with X-rays. He has the latest equipments. The entire staff is good. We highly recommend this Doctor to all.

tags: Wait time,
context: Dental Surgery,Dental Braces Fixing,Laser Gum Surgery,Dental Implant Fixing,
review: Dr Manish Sonawane was extremely friendly throughout the course of the treatment. He was very confident with the treatment process and and always ensured that I need not worry at any point. He was always available via phone in case I had any questions. Overall it was a really good experience and I would definitely recommend him to other friends of mine.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Manish is a very nice doctor.  He's very friendly, my treatment is going extremely well. I'm happy with it. I'm glad that he's my dentist. If there's any sort of pain, which is normal for people who have braces, he responds immediately. He's very punctual for the follow-up appointments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Required 4 extractions, but my experience was so totally smooth that my discomfort during the procedure was Nil. He explained everything to me in detail and cleared all my doubts, extremely patient. Always greets me with a smile and his experience and personality will make your visit worth it!!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr explained the cause and the treatment ( surgery) he was to perform. He has been precise in the procedure. Has always kept the interest of the patient on priority. Ensured that all is perfectly done. After completing, doctor gave detailed instructions to be followed. This gives clarity and lot of confidence.  Feeling absolutely fine today. In fact doctor called next day to enquire and take stck of situation. Excellent experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very good diagnosis and treatment. Explained the complete procedure for treatment and tooth implant for clarity. Also treated cracked tooth.
Doctor was very friendly and explained everything properly.  Gave me alot of clarity regarding the condition of my wisdom tooth as well as the condition of my second molars.
Dr. Sonawane is the friendliest dentist I have come across. He explains the problem thoroughly and listens to you very patiently. Would recommend him to everyone.
